SocialMediaPosting.headline: Ms. Monica Yang’s Story - Pittsburgh Student - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope students will grow according to their own expectations and not the expectations of others…”

– Ms. Monica Yang, Aspiring Educator @PittEducation https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2021/students-grow-according-their-own-expectations/
